verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: is] nearing a deal to lift sanctions on Chinese telecom giant ZTE in exchange for major shake - ups at the highest levels of the company according to the Wall Street Journal . The deal would come after weeks of negotiations over the US crackdown on ZTE .

[ARG1: The Trump administration] is [V: nearing] [ARG2: a deal to lift sanctions on Chinese telecom giant ZTE in exchange for major shake - ups at the highest levels of the company according to the Wall Street Journal] . The deal would come after weeks of negotiations over the US crackdown on ZTE .
